description: A recap of the alerts that appeared on Cook County facility fire panels.  A building's Fire Panel shows all alarm/alert activity for the building,  The report also lists descriptions of each alarm.

metadata.attribution: Cook County Department of Facilities Management

name: Facilities Management - Fire Panel Report, by Location, with Detail - July 2011
